title: Help
content:
Hi I'll be a btech fresher to the rr campus and I need to ask something.
I saw someone on this subreddit say he called the hostel and they told him the nb and nbx blocks got booked. I'd like to know how true this is as hostel admissions cannot be done yet for management quota, kcet and jee quota as it requires an admission slip which only pessat people seemed to have recieved. I've gone to the campus before and spoken with the wardens and they told us that majority of the btech freshers will be in the nb block. What happens to the kcet, management, jee guys as they have not booked yet. Is this something to do with the hostels inefficiency or do they have a reserved number for pessat students or is this simply an excuse to have us in the briefing session

comments.body:
I don't think there's any quota for anyone

And yeah, hostel management is trash and works independently from college management

Sorry
are u guys give option to stay in ec campus boys hostel?
